Line 99: Line 99:
*[[Linux-Gamers.net | Linux-Gamers.net LIVE!]] is a [[Live DVD]] game-oriented [[Linux]] distribution that offers limited, if not at all, general usage. It is made as a Live DVD distribution only and doesn't contain an installer on the DVD.<ref>[http://live.linux-gamers.net Linux-Gamers.net LIVE!]</ref>
*[[Linux-Gamers.net | Linux-Gamers.net LIVE!]] is a [[Live DVD]] game-oriented [[Linux]] distribution that offers limited, if not at all, general usage. It is made as a Live DVD distribution only and doesn't contain an installer on the DVD.<ref>[http://live.linux-gamers.net Linux-Gamers.net LIVE!]</ref>
*[[Ubuntu |Ultimate Edition gamer's edition]] is a Ubuntu based distribution that has included many Linux games by default but unlike [[Linux-Gamers.net | Linux-Gamers.net LIVE!]] it is not meant as a Live DVD portable environment, and so it doesn't have some specialized driver installation.<ref>[http://ultimateedition.info/Ultimate_Edition_1.8 Ultimate Edition]</ref>
*[[Ubuntu |Ultimate Edition gamer's edition]] is a Ubuntu based distribution that has included many Linux games by default but unlike [[Linux-Gamers.net | Linux-Gamers.net LIVE!]] it is not meant as a Live DVD portable environment, and so it doesn't have some specialized driver installation.<ref>[http://ultimateedition.info/Ultimate_Edition_1.8 Ultimate Edition]</ref>
â
*The [[Fedora Project]] hosts a [[Live CD]] gaming spin of their [[Fedora Linux]] operating system.
+
